html:
3.18.20  7:47 am   What's your favourite meme

     the passage of time

3.18.20  7:34 am   What's your opinion on horses, tigers, leopards and salmons?

     there's got to be some kind of compromise

3.18.20  6:42 am   How to control Corona?

     remain calm (try to pronounce the 'L')

3.18.20  6:21 am   When was the last time you used velcro?

     hm ... 2019 i used it as a sound effect for a video

3.18.20  6:18 am   are you running for the next US presidency?

     i'll think about it

3.18.20  6:12 am   How are the trees doing?

     pretty good

3.18.20  5:08 am   What's your favourite sleeping position

     AWAKE

3.18.20  4:55 am   what percentage of the population is normal?

     100

3.18.20  4:47 am   Can you make a rough estimate of how many questions you answered on this website? 

     sure

3.18.20  4:08 am   Which electromagnet has had the greatest impact on your life?

     hm.... earth?

3.18.20  3:39 am   What do you think heaven looks like?

     it has to keep changing, or else it's no good

3.18.20  3:36 am   Are you a human being from earth?

     oh that would explain a lot

3.18.20  3:12 am   are you feeling well?

     yes

3.18.20  2:45 am   What goes first in your opinion the milk or the cereal.

     i'll have to watch an instant replay

3.18.20  2:42 am   What inspired you to create your style on videos?

     i'm just trying to do whatever i can

      Btw very JAZZY indeed :))

     i'm not so sure about that

3.18.20  2:37 am   If you could choose a planet to live in which one would it be

     earth

     and why? 

     it has meals and other amenities

3.18.20  2:23 am   You get so many questions, how do you manage to answer every question here? 

     part of the trick is that i don't post the ones i don't answer

3.18.20  2:21 am   How many beans are too many beans?

     just enough

3.18.20  1:51 am   Do you copy and paste answers such as, "I was gonna say no but now that I think about it yes" or do you remember the saying and just type it out?

     remember, yes. type, no. copy, no. paste, yes

3.18.20  1:50 am   When's the next video?

     i am taking predictions

3.18.20  1:17 am   Do you think there will ever be a multiverse

     *where*

      or everything we find just will be one universe?

     universe is supposed to mean 'everything' so if there is more than that, then you'll have to blame language for not keeping up

3.18.20  12:48 am   Is the world flat

     it used to be but now it's a little bent

3.18.20  12:37 am   how to cultivate normalcy?

     it's about taking those low hanging fruit, and lowering them just a bit more

3.18.20  12:17 am   Ya like soup?

     no

     What kind?

     it's a tie, between muck and goup

3.18.20  12:09 am   do you have a life

     oh that would explain a lot

3.18.20  12:06 am   Is it worth it, to do what you do?

     yes

3.17.20  11:58 pm   What exactly is the jazz section of your website meant to accomplish?

     very low key casual jams. zero pressure

     I do truly find it very inciteful but I don't know exactly why.

3.17.20  11:41 pm   Will the birds fly tomorrow?

     according to the schedule, yes

3.17.20  11:34 pm   where is "the goat"

     look around you

3.17.20  11:34 pm   I know this is kinda late, but how did you come up with the idea for your video "what is love?" 

     that might have actually been from so many people asking that on the questions page

3.17.20  11:28 pm   how to stop human wellbeing being tied to the economy?

     2 ways. everyone could do everything themself, or, everyone could do everything extremely together, more together than anyone ever imagined possible. economy (money) is simply a go-between, like a messenger between all the single-selfs until that one day in the future when we are all together able to become actual one self................ think of it this way,.... remember the old days when your brain had to pay your arm to move

3.17.20  11:25 pm   can trees be gay?

     they have to be

3.17.20  11:19 pm   Can you cut hedge cutters with the same pair of  hedge cutters?

     maybe with mirrors somehow

      Do you own hedge cutters yourself?

     no

3.17.20  10:57 pm   Can you make a ringtone with lyrics?

     that's not gonna work too well unless the music goes with it

3.17.20  10:55 pm   Pop quiz: How do I get in touch with someone?

     have you considered shapeshifting

3.17.20  10:37 pm   How do you edit your videos? How do you make them?

     i am finding out now, at this moment

3.17.20  10:15 pm   you don't really use samples in your songs.  is that something you want to explore eventually or is it not for you?

     one thing i discovered recently through an extraneous side project was the art of sampling myself. i discovered some very interesting tricks that i would not have discovered otherwise

3.17.20  10:03 pm   Favorite disney character?

     walt

3.17.20  10:02 pm   whats the smallest weird number?

     .01

3.17.20  9:57 pm   What's your MBTI??

     regular

3.17.20  9:55 pm   How do I play basketball 

     never heard of it

3.17.20  9:51 pm   can you write in arabic

     i'll try

3.17.20  9:21 pm   bill, how do you learn the meaning of the universe through impaling a potato with a spoon

     looks like you've answered your own question

3.17.20  9:10 pm   how to stop

     you'll have to start something else

3.17.20  9:02 pm   whats the best way to climb a mountain?

     stand in the exact right geological area and let mountains form under you

3.17.20  9:00 pm   what is your opinion on sleep?

     difficult to even imagine

3.17.20  8:55 pm   Do you how to make a tiger whale wasp unborn itself?

     no

3.17.20  8:41 pm   Hi I'm Steve 

     i want to believe you

3.17.20  8:39 pm   ever thought of tackling "giant steps"?

     i recall giving it sort of a casual hug

3.17.20  8:35 pm   What is your favorite music creator?

     it's my job to be it. whether or not i can
